tokens.text: receives breeding interest from nearby villagers

generated_doNotEdit.title: Receive Love Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the villager to stop so another villager can breed with it. Can only be used by a Villager.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
